Oasis Beta Testing Phase

We are stoked to see you join the Beta Test Phase for Oasis.

Hi There,

Thank you for taking some time out of your busy schedule to test run Oasis. We are on a journey to improve the regular event experience!

Please note that Oasis is NOT production ready. We are however working really hard to hit that stage !

This means ;

  • Your data as a Beta Test User might get deleted.
  • You would experience bugs while using the service now. Please report them.

    • We are gunning to make Oasis as User Centered as possible. Hence, your sincere feedback would go a long way. Please send them our way!
